documentation.title: CalendarSettings Class [PHP]
documentation.metakeywords: php calendar,php ajax calendar,php date picker,php date time picker
documentation.metadescription: KoolCalendar is excellent PHP Calendar control that is features-rich, easy to integrate to web sites and simple to customize. Combining DatePicker and TimePicker, KoolCalendar offers special features like Ajax Capability, Multi-view, Quick month selection, etc. Last but not least, its revolutionary rendering using CSS sprites skyrockets its loading time.

property.name: Orientation
property.shortdesc: Get or set the rendering orientation of month.
property.longdesc: Get or set the rendering orientation of month.

property.name: MonthLayout
property.shortdesc: Get or set the layout of month.
property.longdesc: Get or set the layout of month.

property.name: ShowOtherMonthsDays
property.shortdesc: Get or set whether KoolCalendar show other month days in month table.
property.longdesc: Get or set whether KoolCalendar show other month days in month table.

property.name: ShowDayCellToolTips
property.shortdesc: Get or set whether KoolCalendar show tooltip when mouse hovers the day.
property.longdesc: Get or set whether KoolCalendar show tooltip when mouse hovers the day.

property.name: ShowToday
property.shortdesc: Get or set whether KoolCalendar highlight today date.
property.longdesc: Get or set whether KoolCalendar highlight today date.

property.name: ShowRowHeader
property.shortdesc: Get or set whether KoolCalendar show row header.
property.longdesc: Get or set whether KoolCalendar show row header.

property.name: ShowColumnHeader
property.shortdesc: Get or set whether KoolCalendar show column header.
property.longdesc: Get or set whether KoolCalendar show column header.

property.name: NavigateAnimation
property.shortdesc: Get or set the settings of navitation animation.
property.longdesc: Get or set the settings of navitation animation.

property.name: FirstDayOfWeek
property.shortdesc: Get or set the first day of week.
property.longdesc: Get or set the first day of week.

property.name: FocusedDate
property.shortdesc: Get or set focused date in KoolCalendar.
property.longdesc: Get or set focused date in KoolCalendar. By setting this date, we will let KoolCalendar know the month to be shown.

property.name: RangeMinDate
property.shortdesc: Get or set min date in KoolCalendar.
property.longdesc: Get or set min date in KoolCalendar. User may not able to select the date prior to RangeMinDate.

property.name: RangeMaxDate
property.shortdesc: Get or set max date in KoolCalendar.
property.longdesc: Get or set max date in KoolCalendar. User may not able to select the date after the RangeMaxDate.

property.name: ShowNavigation
property.shortdesc: Get or set where KoolCalendar show navigation buttons.
property.longdesc: Get or set where KoolCalendar show navigation buttons.

property.name: ShowFastNavigation
property.shortdesc: Get or set where KoolCalendar show fast navigation buttons.
property.longdesc: Get or set where KoolCalendar show fast navigation buttons.
property.samplecode: <?php ... $datetimepicker->CalendarSettings->ShowFastNavigation=false;// Not showing the fast navigation buttons. ... ?>

property.name: FastNavigationStep
property.shortdesc: Get or set the step numbers of fast navigation.
property.longdesc: Get or set the step numbers of fast navigation.
property.samplecode: <?php ... $datetimepicker->CalendarSettings->FastNavigationStep=4;// Not showing the fast navigation buttons. ... ?>
